tool_description: Adapts and optimizes content for specific social media platform requirements, formats, and best practices.

original_content.description: Original content text to be optimized

source_platform.description: Original platform: instagram, facebook, twitter, linkedin, tiktok, or generic

content_type.description: Type of content: post, story, reel, video, carousel, or article

maintain_core_message.description: Keep the core message consistent across platforms

optimize_hashtags.description: Adjust hashtags for each platform's best practices

adjust_tone.description: Modify tone to match platform culture

error_messages: Invalid source platform: Use one of [instagram, facebook, twitter, linkedin, tiktok, generic]
Invalid target platforms: Use platforms from [instagram, facebook, twitter, linkedin, tiktok]
Invalid content type: Use one of [post, story, reel, video, carousel, article]
Empty original content: Provide content text to optimize
Too many target platforms: Maximum 5 platforms allowed for optimization
usage: Provide original content, source platform, target platforms, and content type. Optionally control message consistency, hashtag optimization, and tone adjustment. Returns platform-specific optimized versions.

optimized_content.description: Array of optimized content for each target platform

platform_names.description: Corresponding platform names for each optimized version

optimization_notes.description: Notes explaining key optimizations made for each platform

character_counts.description: Character count for each optimized version
